inn1.comm: Forward defence. Good area by Ongondo
driven straight to cover this time. Uppish but falls safe of the cover fielder.
No shot offered. Not much carry in that delivery either.
Played straight to cover again. This time no risk of taking the aerial route.
Solid forward defence from Gibbs.
No shot offered once more. Not a lot of bounce but seems to get some movement of the deck. Might be those little cracks. Maiden over to start his campaign.
Just too straight. Right into his legs. Just worked to square leg to get off the mark first ball.
Forward defence. Good line and length from Odoyu. Has a bit of experience with 107 mathes.
thick outside edge. Runs down to the 3rd man region.
Forward defence. Well bowled.
Too straight. Worked down, but doesn't get it past the keeper.
Slashed over cover. Just too straight for the deep extra cover to cut off. That's the first boundary. Not timed to perfection from Gibbs, but got enough to reach the fence.
Solid forward defence.
Played of the frontfoot to mid on. No runs there this time
Full and straight. Clipped away through midwicket. Not timed too well, but gets a couple.
Good line and length, better carry as well. No shot offered though.
Shortish delivery. Played past point with great timing and runs away for another boundary.

Shortish delivery, Amla pushes just a bit too hard at it for defending, scoopss it straight back to the bowler. He makes no mistake and that's the first breakthough for the Kenyans on South African soil this series.
Half-volley. You just can't bowl there to Gibbs. Just timed sweetly through the extra cover area.
Forward defence. Better length to Gibbs that is.
No shot offered. Does seem to get a bit of swing as well.
Pushed to midwicket, not risking a single there.
No shot offered. Odoyo seems to get a bit more bounce from this end.
Backward defence from Gibs. Good over by Odoyo.
Forward defence. Good length from Ongondo, got a bit more bounce there too than on previous deliveries.
Flicked just past midwicket. Manages to get threee well-run runs. Kallis off the mark now too.
good area again by Ongondo, no shot offered by Gibbs.
Inventive little sweepshot from Gibbs. Just walks across the deck and helps the ball over square leg.
No shot offered from Gibbs once more.
Driven of the frontfoot, just past the bowler and gets the one.
Big appeal for the lbw, umpire says no, seems to be a bit too high and might have gone down leg.
Straight drive, not timed well though. Gets one.
Once more, Gib bs goes across the line of the ball. Just fliks it down leg and helps it on it's way down to fine leg.
Wide outside off. A lot of movement there from Odoyo. But started the delivery too wide.
Forward defence from Gibbs. Odoyo hitting better areas now.
Wild swing from Gibbs. A little bit too adventurous this time. Gets a little inside edge just missing the stumps.
Driven straight to mid off. Not timed at all.
Hit over cover again. Falls just short of the man at deep extra cover. Gibbs remains on strike taking a single on the last ball of the over.
Good delivery, Gibbs rock on the backfoot. Not timed too well again. Pitch is still a bit slow.
Just worked off his legs to midwicket.
Beautiful straight drive. Classic Kallis. Timed muh better. Just too full from Ongondo though. Top class batsman.
Defencded of the backfoot. Solid.
Well bowled, Gets a bit of movement towards the leg side. Kallis covers his stumps and offers no shot.
No shot offered once more. Well bowled.
Half-volley. Gibbs hammers it through the covers effortlessly.
Forward defence. Straight to point.
Shortish, Gibbs goes for the pull shot, ball stays too low though.
Miss timed drive from Gibbs. Runs down the track, but still too short and miss times it badly.
Full and straight. Clipped to midwicket. He cuts it off and Gibbs leaves Kallis to face the last delivery.
Shortish and straight. Kallis a bit uncertain wether to go straight bat or go for the poull. Stays low on him and eventually misse it all around. Too high for lbw though.
Another typical Gibbs sweep shot over the top of square leg. Hard to bowl to Gibbs when he walks across the line like that.
Full and straight. Gibbs flicks his wrists and hits it straight to midwicket.
Gibbs comes down the track, bounces over his head.
Pulled away to deep square leg.
Backward defence.
Just clipped through midwicket. Just too full from Ongondo.
Works with the wrists again. Not timed to perfection though.
Short and widish, slapped through midwicket of the backfoot. Gibbs on the pull quite soon today.
Forward defence.
Pulled away after coming down the track. Timed very well. Gibbs in a very attacking state of mind it seems.
Wide down leg.
Just drops the ball in the direction of cover and gets a quick single. Good cricket from Gibbs rotating the strike too.
Forward defence from Kallis, very solid indeed. There has been  a lot of talk around Kallis' technique. Seems fine today. But still a bit of worries about the footwork.
Worked away to deep square leg off the backfoot.
Forward defence from Kallis.
Tries to come down the track, just pops the ball in the air, luckilly towards the leg side and not straight back to the bowler.
Short and down leg. Attempted bouncer I would think. Just goes down leg.
Played staight to midwicket off the frontfoot with a crossed bat.
Slower ball. Driven straight to mid off. Seems to bowl an off-spin slower delivery.
Comes down the track again. Seems to be a bit uncomfortable though. Miss-timed again.
Another dot to end the over. Kallis struggling a bit here. Seems to be going across the line too much in stead of playing his classic-Kallis straight shots.
Well bowled, good line and length. Gibbs defends in the direction of point.
Gibbs pulls at it mightily, but doesn't get a good connection on that one.
Going across the line again. Still not timed too well. Straight to midwicket again.
Finally gets one in the middle of the blade. Goes across the line once more, but this time frees the arms and hits it mightily over miwicket.
Hit straight this time but the bowler picks it up beautifully and saves a cerain four.
Driven on the up straight to cover. Deck a bit slow still.
Goes down the track again, swings hard at it. Gets a thickish top edge and runs down to fine leg.
Shocker down leg. Full toss as well. Looked like a attempted slower ball yorker. just not coming off.
Another caught and bowl! Gibbs coms down the track, scoops it up to the bowler who takes an extremely good catch. Never easy to take the catch of your own bowling and that one was a bit of a flyer.
No shot offered first bal for AB. Needs to settle things down a bit now.
Nothing shot from De Villiers, just hangs the bat out on the offside with no real intent. Dangerous from AB.
Forward defence.
Worked away to deep midwicket. Keeps the strike does Kallis.
Flicks it around the corner, short 45 just can't get there. Manages two, should have been 3 though. Lazy running.
Kallis defends it straight. Looks better than the constant going across the line.
Misses out on the full and straight one. Hits the pads, but going a mile down leg.
Solid and staight forward defence.
Worked down to 3rd man. Gets the single easily.
Another nothing shot from de Villiers. Just hanging out the bat on the off side.
Driven staight down the track. Free hit for de Villiers now. Stepping over the front line.
Hits the free hit down the ground and over the fielder at mid on. First boundary for AB.
Another wide down leg. Ongondo might be tiring a bit after 8 stight overs in this South African sun.
Poor stroke from AB. Just scoops it straight up. Lucky to get away with that.
Another no-ball. Paddled around the corner. Now Kallis gets a free hit. Ongondo struggling.
Kallis goes over cover. High and handsome. Elegant shot but with brute force.
Better deliery this time. Miss timed to mid on. Gets a easy single though and rotates the strike.
Comes down the track. Ongondo pushed it a bit wider and does so succesfully. No shot offered though and the wide not called.
Waiting just long enough and then just pushing it down to 3rd man to get an easy single.
Just played to mid on.
Forward defence, thinks of a single. de Villiers sent back by Kallis. And wisely so.
Coming down the track again. but just not enough room for him to free the arms. Just plays a forward defence.
Full and widish. Squeezed to cover for a quick single.
Defended off the backfoot. Straight to cover though. No runs there.
Driven straight by Kallis, but straight to mid off unfortunately.
De Villiers cuts it hard out to deep cover.
Cut straight to point. No runs there.
Helped on its way down to long leg. Too straight there.
Driven straight to cover. Timed a bit better. Struggling on a bit of a slower pitch. Deck not quite as expected.
Defended for a single. just opened the blade at the last moment and got the single.
Turned on to the onside once more. Gets an easy single down to deep midwicket.
Cut powerfully down to 3rd man.
Worked past square leg to deep midwicket and gets the one. Came down the track once more.
Driven straight to cover once again.
In the air!! Kallis too soon on the stroke and hits in straight to mid off. Just dropping short luckily for him.
Played to point this time, no run there.
Yorker. Well-bowled by Odhiambo.

Comes down the track, ball is just too straight. De Villiers misses, hits his thigh pad and goes on to hit the stumps. Very strange way to get out. Seemed to have his stumps covered. Can feel a bit unlucky though can De Villiers.
No shot offered. Duminy watching the behaviour of the deck first.
Very wide outside off. Just heard its 35 degrees celcius out there.
Forward defence from Duminy. Seems very solid for a start.
Forward defence once more.
Driven straight to mid off this time.
Driven to mid off once again. Duminy seems to have a better-safe-than-sorry attitude. That's what SA needs right now.
Driven straight to cover.
Pulled away past square leg. No chance of stopping that.
Pushed out between cover and point.
Worked around his legs past short 45
Defended off the frontfoot.
Tries to pull the ball handsomely, only manages to get an inside edge and beats the keeper. Lucky.
Swings away and hits it past midwicket. Beautiful shot.
Played down to the shortish 3rd man.
Forward defence.
Quick single taken to the shortish 3rd man, just too short from Kamande.
Big appeal from Kamande, seems to have been going down leg. Attempted sweep shot though.
Driven to deep cover this time. Manages to get 2.
Scooped back to the bowler. A bit of a leading edge. Drops short though.
Short, cut away to the deep cover area.
Pushed away to cover again. Better line and length from Varaiya this time.
Good over from Varaiya comes to an end.
Neat little late cut from Kallis. Just opening the blade at the last second.
Driven to the deep cover area of the backfoot. Kallis' innings going along steadily.
Worked aroud the corner to the fine leg boundary. Short 45 chase it down and manages to save the oundary.
Driven straight down to long off. Rotates the strike again.
Played to the deep cover fence again. Kallis just picking off the singles and rotating the strike now
Pushed down to long on and gets another walkable single.
Shortish, but straight. Duminy plays it straight to mid on.
Driven to deep cover again. Just livig off the singles here
Pushed down to long on again. Brings up the 150.
Sweeps to deep square again. Yet another single for Duminy.
Pushed down to long on again. No pressure put on the batsmen from the fielding side.
Miss timed drive. No single this time.
Short and wide, Kallis cuts it away powerfully to bring up his half century from 65 deliveries.
Driven straight back to the bowler this time.
Worked down to long leg. Thinks of two, but decides against it wisely.
Wide down leg.
Eased away to long off once again.
Driven straight to Cover this time.
Sliced away behind point this time. Runs away to the fence.
Down to long on again.
Played down to long off this time
Played down to long on again.
Driven down to long off.
Chopped away past point, runs the first hard and manages to get a second.
Only just beats the fielder at short mid wicket. Then gets an easy single.
Quicker delivery this time. played down to long off again.
Cut away to deep cover. Free-hit to come.
Wide down leg. Duminy takes a swing at it. Hits it along the aerial route to long leg. Gets FOUR.
Paddled around his leg. Manages to get 2 well-runned runs. Smart shot that.
Driven down to long off again for a single. Drinks will now be taken again.
Driven away to deep cover again. Another single.
Cut away to the deep extra coer fence. Gets another single. Working the singles now are SA.
Kallis comes down the track. Beats him all ends up. Keeper unfortunately misses the ball. Was an excellent stumping opportunity.
Driven down the track for another single.
Overpitched. Outside off. Kallis drives it out to the deep for his favorite way of scoring.
Defended of the backfoot.
Comes down the wicket. turns it on to the onside and settles for the single.
Another single out to the deep off the backfoot.
Very wide outside off. Beats the bat and the keeper. Manage to run 3 do the South Africans.
Miss-timed, misscued drive shot from Kallis. Still not hitting it cleanly.
Short and too straight. Duminy reverse pulls the ball away mightily.
Missed by Duiny, trying to work it off the the leg side.
Worked around the corner y Duminy once again. that brings up Duminy's 50.
Wide but cut away for another single.
Swept away by Kallis to long leg. Still just singles from Kallis.
Swept again, but straight to short 45 on the onside this time.
Driven straight down to long on. They need to step on the gas now do South Africa.
Swept down fine again. Still just rotating the strike.
Driven down the ground yet again for yet another single.
Driven down to long off again.
Kallis drives it down to long on again. Becoming very predictable.
Driven straight back to the bowler. No single this time.
Gone! Kallis goes for the cut shot, gets a thickish edge, but the fielder takes a good catch low to the ground. Good innings from Kallis coming to an end.
Standard forward defence.
Driven down to the long on fielder. Ontong manages to get the second run too. Well run.
Good over for the Kenyans. The big wicket of Jaques Kallis and only three runs conceded.
Tickled around the corner for a single.
Tickled around the corner once agai.
Driven off the backfoot to deep extra cover.
Tickled around the corner, Ontong lightening fast.
Forward defence from Ontong. Well bowled.
Comes down the track. miss-times it a it hough. Gets an easy single
Driven straight through the bowler's hands down to long off.
Misses the ball. hits him on the body.
Hit straight to the offside short 45. Not risking the run this time.
Driven down to the deep cover fence.
Just played past cover this time.
Worked around the corner off the backfoot this time.
Flicked straight to midwicket
Worked around to the deep square fence. Well run couple

Attempted late-cut, not working this time though. Missed completely, lucky for him. Nearly edged that straight into the gloves of the keeper. 33 balls without a boundary now. Powerplay taken by the batting side.
wide outside off. Maybe ust a tad harsh. Wasn't that wide. But fair call
Excellent cover drive. Sweetly timed but a shocking effort on the fence.
Wide outside off again. That's a close call. Might feel a bit unlucky otieno
Run down to 3rd man.
Tucked away past swuare leg. Manages an easy two to long leg.
Heaved away mightily, powerplay coming into play now. No fielders out on the deep midwicket fence now.
Pushed straight to mid on.
Beautiful clever little late cut from Ontong. Just beating the fielder out at 3rd man.
Driven to mid on.
Swing and miss. Not making any contact at all.
Cut straight into the hands of point. Well timed just not that well placed by Ontong.
Driven away to the deep cover fence. Manages another walkable single.
Wide outside off
Turned around to deep square leg.
Another wide, good bouncer, but just too high. 250 up.

There we go, the extra delivery getting him the wicket. Ontong goes for the big heave over deep square leg, but that's a real long carry to make and Ontong got bit of an top edge. No mistake with the catch. Well-taken.
Cut past cover and gets a single.
Worked around the corner once again for another single.
Pulled away beautifully! Just splits midwicket and mid on perfectly.
Goes across the line and gets another single to midwicket.
Flicked away past midwicket. Right through the hands.
Cut away to deep cover by Duminy. Giving Boucher the strike
Cut to cover. Rotating the strike
Very wide outside off. Will the extra all bring another wicket?
uminy pushes it to midwicket. Thinks of a single. Decides against it.
Pulled away powerfully but straight to deep square unfortunately.
Comes down the track, times the clip-shot beautifulled. Just picks it over deep square leg.
Full and straight. Driven away.
Miss timed but gets one to midwicket.
Full toss spliced down to 3rd man.
Worked down to 3rd man. Gets another easy single
Driven past mid on, runs the first hard and as a result is awarded with another.
Played out to deep square leg.
Slower delivery, pushed out to point.
Attempted sweep, way tto early on the shot.
Hit over cover, no fielder on the fence was ever going to save that from hitting the fence.
TOP EDGE! Boucher goes for the big heave.
Beautifully hit over the top right out of the screws! That's high and mighty
Worked away of the frontfoot to a deepish long off. Manages a second run easily
Driven away to deep cover.
Short and straight. Miss timed pull shot. SA's timing today not what it should be. Deck might still be a bit slow.
Hit over the top but straight to long on. 300 up as the ball falls just short.
Pulled away but still not timed too well. Only getting one to deep square. Getting dangerous to go for that very long boundary.
Slower delivery, short and wide and cut away safely to deep cover point.
Big swing and miss from Boucher
Worked away to point again. Single taken.
Hammered down the ground! Only getting 2 though.
Hit down straight to long on. Slower delivery but picked wel by Boucher.
Driven down to long off. Fumble  by the fielder creates a second.
Ferocious swing by Duminy, not getting hold of the ball though.
Gone! that brings to an end the great innings of Duminy. Going for the big shot over the top just not clearing the fielder at long off.
Swing and miss outside off. Nearly gets the fine edge.
Played just past point. Gets an easy walk through to the other end.
Boucher rotating he strike now. Slower delivery outside off. Cut down to the deep.
Well bowled. Attempted bouncer, not bouncing all that much though. Hit straight on the arm, requirs some assistance from the change room, some ice/ice spray.
No shot offered.
Anothr dot. Well bowled by Otieno, Huge swing and miss from Morkel.
Heaved over to long on. Manages an easy two.
Thumped over the deep midwicket fence! 50 up for Boucher.
Wide outside off
Straight over the top! Full and straight and Boucher gets under it and frees the arms.
Pulled awy to the deep midwicket fence.
Bouncer. Got Morkel cornered and rattled, no shot offered.

GONE! Slower delivery. Morkel fooled and goes across the line, misses by a mile and middle stump is hit hard with the bang of the ball and the bails find themselves dislodged. Goodbye Mr. Morkel, Mr. Dangerman is gone.
wide down leg.
Dropped! Boucher flicks the ball straight to short 45, right into the hands and straight down.
Dropped down to shortish 3rd man. Gets a walkthrough.
Miss timed. Another good slower delivery.
Yorker. Right into his legs. Dug out well and gets a run as reward.
Very needed, Botha goes straight over the top. The captain comes to the party.
Another wide down leg. Another ball to come. Will it be costly?
Just a single to point off the last delivery of the innings.

inn2.comm: Worked down to 3rd man, not taking the single tough.
Cut straight to point. Well bowled and very well fielded by AB de Villiers
Worked past midwicket. Not too much movement for Zondeki.
Shortish and straight, Defended away to point.
No shot offered, a lot of away-swing for Morkel, Albie taking the new ball ahead of his younger brother Morne.
No shot offered.
The away swing leading to the swing and miss from ouma.
Another excellent line and length delivery. No shot offered.
Dug out by Ouma. Ball full and straight from Morkel.
Great yorker from Albie Morkel. First over from im a maiden. Gets off to a great start.
Shortish and staight delivery. Backward defence.
Wide down leg. Seems to have touched something though. Maybe not.
Full and straight. Soid forward defence. Perfect length from Zondeki though.
Shortish and straigh again. Hits the thigh pad. Thinks about taking one. Not smart though. Decides against it.
Just a tad too short. Getting it a bit fuller might lead to more wickets.
Better length. Played down to 3rd man though.
Cut down to 3rd man again. Too short again from Zondeki. But getting more bounce and carry than the Kenyans did.
Driven straight to cover off the backfoot. Just a bit too short from Morkel as well. Especially with all the swing he gets he should be bowling fuller.
Short and straight. Waters just rocks onto the backfoot and hammers it ps midwicket.
Backward defence. Still bowling too short is Zondeki.
Boundary!  Short and wide, stayed low, wasnt too fast either. Smacked past Gibbs at cover.
Once again he is short and wide outside off. Cut straight to point. Not good bowling too well. No front foot shots.
Short and wide again! Played past point but 3rd man gets to it.
Shortish once more from Zondeki, but straighter this time. Hits the thigh pad and drops straight to the ground. No thoughts of anattempted run.
Fullish delivery. Gets the batsman to drive at it, miss timed though.
Well-bowled by Morkel. A lot of swing. Swing and miss from Ouma.
ANother dot. Shorter this time, pulled straight to the fielder at midwicket.
Fullish and straiht. Forward defence. Seems solid tis time.
Cut down to 3rd man. Hard job for Morne Morkel on the fence. Just ouncing right in front of him and misses it in the end.
Another play and miss. Beautiful bowling from Morkel.
Hits him on the body again.
Another dot. Better delivery in terms of his length this time.
Better line and length again. Getting the batsman on the frontfoot now. Better chance of getting the first breakthrough
Another good delivery. Pushed bck intoo his crease. No room for the batsman to play his shots.
Shortish and wide again. Amla does well at 3rd man to save the boundary. Too short, too wide, too often from Zondeki
Edge this time! Ball shortish again but a bit straight this time and the batsman finds himselfs cramped for space and only manages to snick it through to Boucher who makes no mistake. One down..
Short and wide this time. Ouma cuts it powerfully past point.
Backfoot defence. Much straighter this time.
Driven off the backfoot straight to cover.
Beautiful bowling! Another swing and miss.
Short and wide again. Cut past the point fielder, ABde Villiers and down to Albie's brother, Morne Morkel.
Clips the ball over the top of midwicket. Real attacking attitude first ball up.
Short and wide again from Zondeki. Cut through point with ease. Zondeki bowling not too well.
Pushed to midwicket. Better line from Zondeki but still too short!!
Short and wide from Zondeki again.
Huge LBW appeal, might just be going down leg. Good decision.
Better delivery, no shot offered this time. But a lot of movement from the deck this time. Zondeki should pitch the ball up.
Leading edge! Just not carrying to Morkel. drops just short of the bowler.
Poor delivery, Short and down leg. Maybe an attempted bouncer.
Forward defence turns out to reward the batsman with a single to mid on.
Forward defence once again. Well bowled by Morkel. No runs this time.
Another wide down leg.
Pushed into the gap and gets a quick single.
Forward defence straight back to the bowler who takes a shye at the keeper.
Good finish to the over. Another forward defence from Ouma.
Full and straight from Morne Morkel first up.
Played to AB at point. Not that wide really. But Morkel seems to be getting pace and bounce.
Half-volley. Driven straight to Gibbs at cover though.
Well bowled bouncer, not too much speed and bounce, but enough for the batsman to duck underneath.
Driven on the up just wide of mid off. Manages to scamper one.
Pulled away mightily! Falls just short of deep square leg fence. Zondeki at fine leg had no chance of saving that.
HUGE one! Goes straight over midwicket! Big one.
Good response from Morkel with a yorker.
Another dot, play and miss from Obanda this time. Still a lot of away swing for Morkel.
No shot offered. Shortish and just outside off from Morkel again this time. Obanda just sees it through.
Full and too straight. Driven down to long on. Lucky to get away with that one.
Good delivery. Defended off the front oot. Drop and run. Well run too.
In the air! But falls right behind the stumps. no one near that one.
Another dot, miss timed after attempting to hit it through the vacant midwicket area.
Another dot ball. This time it's swing and miss outside off. Good line and length to be bowling for Ouma.
Defended off the backfoot. Well-bowled again by Morkel. Two economical overs bowled by the younger brother.
Full and straightish, defended in the direction of cover. No runs there.
ANother dot ball, Obanda comes down the track and takes a swing but misses.
Slower ball, pushed straight to midwicket. gets a quick single.
Bouncer, into the ribs of Ouma. Must have gotten an edge as he scampers a single.
No shot offered. Full and widish.
Another slower delivery. Pushed to point. No runs to be taken between AB de Villiers and Herchelle Gibbs. No smart ones anyway.
Driven staight to Ontong at Cover. Well bowled by Morne Morkel.
Short and straight. attempted pull, gets the fine inside edge. Boucher makes a full length dive to save the boundary.
Excellent delivery from Morkel, no shot offered wisely. Lots of bounce and movement suddenly.
EDGED! Falls just short of Kallis at slip, real sign of the lack of pace on the pitch.
Hit over the top, not timed very well though. Only gets two. Ontong quick quick to chase that one down.
Backward defence but the ball stays quite low but still manages to keep it out.
No shot offered. Well bowled by Kallis though. Getting the ball to nip back off the deck.
Cut to point. No runs there.
No shot offered once again. Ball not carrying to the keeper though either.
Gone! Rnout! taking on the ever so quick Justin Ontong. He gets the direct hot and Ouma is 20cm short! Gone!
No shot offered. Well bowled Kallis.
Gets the single after pulling the ball away to deep fine leg. falling just short.
Driven straight to cover. Gibbs doe the fielding. Off side packed with Ontong, Gibbs and De Villiers
Played straight to cover again.
Pulled down fine to fine leg. Just the one run.
Wide down leg, manages to run another.
Driven straight to cover off the backfoot. Better line from Morkel this time.
Up in the air! Straight up! Drops in o man's land once again!
Another dot ball to end the over.
Too short by Kallis too this time. Cut down to 3rd man.
Driven off the backfoot to cover.
Played straight to short 45 on the offside.
Worked of his legs to deep square leg.
Another slower off-spin delivery.
Short again. Cut powerfully straight to Gibbs again.
Excellent delivery, no shot offered. Lots of carry through to the keeper.
Over the top of mis off. Not timed too well though. But still wins the race to the fence. Obanda not affraid of hitting the shots.
Drop and run. This time to midwicket.
Short and straight, pulled away mightily.

Another one. Morkel not bowling full enough! The bowlers seems to be enstrangled in an ego competition to see who canbowl short and get away with it. You simply can't bowl half-trackers on this slow pitch!
Full and straight into Obanda's legs.
Slower delivery, fullish, defended to cover.
Good yorker from Kallis. No shot to be played of that.
Another dot, forward defence.
Drive away to mid on. Full and straight from Kallis.
Flicked away to deep square leg. Gets the walk through for one.
Better length this time. No real shot offered that time.
Half volley. Driven over the top of mid off. Might be a promising sign that.
Shorter this time. batsman scrambles to get on the backfoot, no real danger though.
Good delivery, but no shot offered this time from Obanda.
Full and sraight, driven down to long on.
Slower delivery, no shot offered. Keeper takes it on about the third bounce.
Driven down to long off.
No real turn this time around.
Cut straigh to point.
Quicker one from Duminy. Obanda goes for the sweep, too full as well. That's hitting middle and leg three quarters of the way up. Cheers Cheers.
Defended with soft hands. Ball falls just short.
Turned around the corner to deep square leg.
Driven down the ground.
Flicked straight to midwicket.
Full and straight, flicked straight to mid on.
Too short AGAIN from the South Africans. Pulled away mightily over midwicket.
Full and sweetly driven but straight to Gibbs
Late cute down to shortish 3rd man.
Pushed out to point off the front fott.
Yorker, no shot to be played there.
Gone! Played back to a fullish delivery and goes across the line of the ball. That's hitting all three. Umpire Marais Erasmus has no doubts about that one.
Driven down the ground to long on
Flicked to midwicket
Driven straight back to the bowler.
Another dot ball to end the over
Driven down to long off. Shouts of keeper but no second run taken.
Down leg, should have been wide, but Odoyo goes for the shot,
Worked to the on side. Just the one out to the deep midwicket fence.
Shouts of WAIT from both batsmen.
Missfield, no run though. clean pickup might have lead to trouble.
Direct hit from Botha, but Obuya is safe and he gets another single to his name.
Good ball. Squaring up the batsman.
Squeezed out to deep square for the single that brings up the 100
Lazy shot by Odoyo coming down the track
Whipped away to long leg. Only the one this time.
Another dot, cut straight to point.
Driven down to long on just getting it past the bowler.
Driven down the ground once more. Just singles.
Big one! Odoyo goes down the rack and gives it a mighty thump over long on.
GONE! Leading edge from Odoyo as he tries to work the ball to the leg side. Just scoops it right back to Duminy who gets his revenge. Oh so sweet.
Worked away to the on side.
Forward defence. Eventful over. Went for 8 but got the wicket along with being smacked for onr of the biggest sixes of the match.
Nearly makes it through the gate...
Good change of pace by Botha
Fires it flat into the pads. Good change of pace again.
Swept around the corner, maiden!
Worked down to long on once again. Nelson on the board.
Driven straight back to Duminy.
Played straight to short 45 on the off side.
Pushed to a deepish cover.
Full toss. Nearly cut of by AB de Villiers, but does get a hand on it.
In the air! Just past the bowler. Safe.
Miss field from Gibbs. Fumble leading to an easy single.
Flighted delivery, pushed down the ground.
Sliced away to Amla. No run. Good over.
Flicked straight to Midwicket.
Well bowled by Duminy
Worked away for yet another single. This time to short 45 on the leg side.
Yorker. Good variation of length.
Yorker.
Worked away to point.
Yorker, fwd defence.
Gone! Bowled! Yorker, full and straight, Kamande plays all around it. Kenya 6 down.
Play and miss. Straighter delivery this time. Nearly gets the edge.
Another yorker. Only just dug out y Odhiambo
Driven staight to cover.
Worked around to the leg side managing a single to midwicket.
Driven down the ground
Driven straight down again, this time to Amla at long on.
Full and straight. Forward defence from Odhiambo.
Defended off the backfoot. But way too early on the shot. Miss-cued.
Short and straight this time. Defended again.
Flicked away to deep squre leg. Good shot though.
Driven straight to cover. Full and widis delivery. Lucky to get away with that.
Driven straight back to Morkel. Stops it with the boot and the ball gos on to dislodge the bails. Non striker back in his crease though.
Hit over the top sweetly. Zondeki too full and straight and the ball is picked over midwicket.
Another poor delivery. Zondeki falling away quite a bit and pushing that one down leg. far down leg
Too straight again by Zondeki, Just clips the batsman's pads and runs away past Boucher for four legbyes.
Better line and length this time. Defended away to cover.
Another single due to Zondeki bowling too straight.
Leg side AGAIN by Zondeki, not a real good performance by him tonight. Has been plagued by injury though. Coming back into the game now.
Straight again. Clipped over midwicket this time.
Missed opportunity for a runout there.
Defended off the backfoot. Still bowling short.
Yorker, excellent ball, dug out quite well but gets a single as overthrows occur.
Defended of the backfoot. Good slower delivery too.
Driven away off the backfoot. But straight to cover this time.
Good delivery, defended off the frontfoot. ondeki hits a good spot for a change.
Much better from Zondeki this over. Hitting good areas now. Fullish, short of a length, and just outside off.
Bouncer. Finally getting some bounce and carry
Full and straight, not a good delivery and Obuya just picks it up and hammers it over deep square leg
Defended of the front foot.
Run down to 3rd man again. Gets the easy single.
Good line and length. Hesitant defence off the frontfoot.
Down to third man, just falls short of Amla at third man.
Backward defence from Obuya
Gets a single after an attempted pull shot that went south. Well run and good call by the non striker.
SHORT AGAIN and too wide. Zondeki struggling. Cut away majesticly over cover and away for a boundary.
Squeezed down to third man off a full toss.
Swing and miss. Better line and length delivery this time.
Swing and miss again. Shorter delivery.
In the air, over the top but off the toe end of the bat. Not getting anywhere.
Hits the thigh pad and scampers through for a legbye towards midwicket.
Attempted sweepshot.
Whipped away to deep square leg. Manages an easy single
Driven straight to cover.
Squeezed for a single down to long off.
Swing and miss outside off.
Defended straight back to the bowler this time aroud. Well bowled over by Botha
Pushed to midwicket. No run there though. Nearly abig mix up.
Swept to the deep square leg fence. Very well fielded by Ontong. Limits it to two.
Gone! Full toss right at the stumps, hits the pads, quicker pace, right in front. Cheers.
Yorker. Quick again.
Flicked out to deep square.
Dug out to mid on. No runs there.
Driven straight to mid off.
Good line and length, defended off the backfoot straight back to Morkel.
Defended once more. Good areas by Morkel so far.
Driven straight to mid off again.
Driven straight down the ground. Timed very well and they manage to get three easily.
What a catch by Amla! Varaiya goes for the big heave-ho over long on. Amla comes charging in and times the dive to perfection. Takes a very good catch.
Driven down the ground to long off. Easy walkable single there.
Another one falling in no man's land.
Quicker one. Missing everything and hitting him on the pads. Going way down leg though.
Forward defence. No spark anymore in the batsmen.
Play and miss from Ongondo. Good delivery by Morkel. Getting some movement from the deck.
Driven straight to cover this time.
Flicked to midwicket again. No single though this time.
Played on. Gets an inside edge onto his pads from where the ball skids on to hit the stumps. 9 down and the Kenyan ship is on the verge off sinking.
Flicked through to midwicket.
fwd defence.
Miss cued drive
flicked around the corner for a quick single.
Driven down to long on. Gets another walkthrough.
Cut down to third man, good little late cut from Obuya.
Swing and miss from Otieno. Well bowled by Morkel.
Right in the blockhole.
Wide outside off. attempted bouncer I would think. Over his head maybe.
Flicked straight to midwicket.
No real shot offered.

Gone! Holds out at deep midwicket. Kallis takes an easy catch. That's the end of the game. Thank you for joining us here at cricinfo.com, please join s again for the rest of the series and also any other domestic/international cricket games. South Africa win this one by 159 runs.
